parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You do not need to specify this parameter because this parameter will be removed in the future.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the data synchronization instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: SynchronizationDirection
parameters.description:
The synchronization direction. Valid values:

*   **Forward**
*   **Reverse**

> 
*   Default value: **Forward**.
*   You can set this parameter to **Reverse** to pause reverse synchronization only when the topology is two-way synchronization.

parameters.name: SynchronizationJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data synchronization instance. You can call the **DescribeSynchronizationJobs** operation to query the instance ID.
